com.intel.ispplib.connection.device

Interface IBleConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BleIasConnection, DeviceBleConnection

    public interface IBleConnection
    Interface to implement for a Ble connection

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IBleConnection.CONNECTION_STATUS 
      static class  IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Establish gatt connection with the specified device
      boolean disconnect()
      Disconnect from the currently connected gatt connection, if there is one

      Discover Ble services

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect(java.lang.String address,
              boolean autoConnect)
        Establish gatt connection with the specified device
        Parameters:
        address - The BD address of the device, discovered previously during scan.
        autoConnect - The autoconnect parameter, see android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect()
        Disconnect from the currently connected gatt connection, if there is one

      • pair

        boolean pair(java.lang.String address)
        Establish bonding with specified device
        Parameters:
        address - The device address

      • unpair

        boolean unpair(java.lang.String address)
        Remove bonding from the currently bonded device
        Parameters:
        address - The device address

      • writeCharacteristic

        boolean writeCharacteristic(java.util.UUID service,
                          java.util.UUID characteristic,
                          byte[] value)
        Write the specified value to the specified gatt characteristic
        Parameters:
        service - Service unique identifier
        characteristic - Characteristic unique identifier
        value - The value to be written

      • writeCharacteristic

        boolean writeCharacteristic(java.util.UUID service,
                          java.util.UUID characteristic,
                          byte[] value,
                          boolean noResponse)
        Write the specified value to the specified gatt characteristic
        Parameters:
        service - Service unique identifier
        characteristic - Characteristic unique identifier
        value - The value to be written
        noResponse - Tell whether the writetype of the characteristic should be no response

      • readCharacteristic

        boolean readCharacteristic(java.util.UUID service,
                         java.util.UUID characteristic)
        Read the specified characteristic
        Parameters:
        service - Service unique identifier
        characteristic - Characteristic unique identifier

      • discoverServices

        boolean discoverServices()
        Discover Ble services

      • subscribeToCharacteristic

        boolean subscribeToCharacteristic(java.util.UUID service,
                                java.util.UUID characteristic,
                                boolean enabled)
        Subscribe to characteristic notifications.
        Parameters:
        service - Service unique identifier
        characteristic - Characteristic unique identifier
        enabled - boolean enabling or disabling notifications

      • setBleCallbackForIspp

        void setBleCallbackForIspp(IBleCallback bleCallback)
        Set the callback for getting ble gatt callbacks (used by Ispp)
        Parameters:
        bleCallback - the callback to be called when events specific to ispp occur
